sentences.en: a malfunction in one of the engines

sentences.en: Camera malfunction can be caused by shock , humidity, salt water corrosion and soon.

sentences.en: Electrical noise caused by diode or stator malfunction is not acceptable.

sentences.en: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report.

sentences.en: Pertaining to the detection and isolation of a malfunction or mistake.

sentences.en: Reliable quality: Transmission Gear supplied from famous manufacturer avoid of malfunction.

sentences.en: The date was lost due to a software malfunction.

sentences.en: The radiation can damage microprocessors and computer memories, causing them to malfunction.
sentences.cn: 该辐射会破坏微处理器和计算机存储器，使之出故障。

sentences.en: There can be all manner of noise associated with various malfunction.

sentences.en: There must have been a computer malfunction.
You're saying that his left ventricle had been weakened by the lvad malfunction?
sentences.cn: 你声称他的左心室因起搏器故障而开始衰弱?

trans.tran_en: a fault in the way a machine or part of someone’s body works
If a machine or part of the body malfunctions, it fails to work properly
